price: Ɛda a Yεbεboa Nyamesurofoͻ no ano akͻ Ahummͻborͻ Hene no hͻ, tesε nnipa kuo bi a wͻrekͻgye animuonyam (anaa abasobͻdeε no),
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
